mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME TAB_NAME , '' TAB_COMMENT , ORDINAL_POSITION COL_ID , COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME , '' COL_COMMENT , DATA_TYPE DATA_TYPE , CAST(COLUMN_TYPE AS CHAR(30)) COL_TYPE , IS_NULLABLE NULLABLE , COLUMN_KEY COL_KEY FROM information_schema.COLUMNS COL WHERE col.table_schema = 'handsome' ORDER BY COL.TABLE_NAME, COL.COLUMN_NAME

SELECT y.TableName TAB_NAME , MAX(ct.ItemJNDIName) JNDI_NAME , GROUP_CONCAT(ct.InternalCode ORDER BY ct.InternalCode) MODEL_NAMES FROM ydeployments Y , composedtypes ct WHERE 1=1 AND (y.name = REPLACE(ct.ItemJNDIName, 'de.hybris.platform.persistence.', '') OR y.name = REPLACE(ct.ItemJNDIName, 'de.hybris.platform.persistence.link.', '') OR y.name = REPLACE(ct.ItemJNDIName, 'de.hybris.platform.persistence.type.', '') ) AND y.tablename IS NOT NULL GROUP BY y.TableName
